Sale & Purchase

We negotiate specific, rare, avant-garde, collector's products, lots, and products of various consumer goods ... -Example of products ... - Various food products. - Various haberdashery. - Art and decoration. - Various tools - TV-Hifi-Video-Household appliances. - Various lots: New stock, downgraded stock, bulk lots - IT: Spare parts, computers, peripherals. - Off-site search ... If, however, you do not find satisfaction with our range of products, you can nevertheless send us your request.
